name: AppInstaller Attempts From URL by DNS
description: AppInstaller.exe is spawned by the default handler for the URI, it attempts to load/install a package from the URL
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.DesktopAppInstaller_* AND process.executable:*\\AppInstaller.exe)`
